announcements.title: Readability Update
announcements.body: Huge thanks to choppytehbear1337 for calling out text readability. Text sizing is now available in Settings. Our recent Reddit post is currently banned, so please use the in-app feedback form to share ideas and bug reports. Hope you're having fun, and thanks for helping improve Stellaris Companion!
